title: Tinfins
description: In the world’s second-most advanced research facility, a brilliant scientest has created a new life form. But in order to survive, they’ll have to destroy his creation.
quote: Would you put your brain in a robot body?
altHero: a big robot shark approaches two divers in a cage
alt1: two divers weld a robot shark
alt2: a robot shark fin emerges between the legs of a woman in a bubble bath
alt3: a green hologram head speaks to a group of soldiers
alt4: a submarine with long arms wrestles with the robot shark
